column2: How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle)  Marijuana (pot, weed)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle)  LSD
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle)  PCP (angel dust)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) MDMA (ecstasy)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) Amphetamines (uppers, pep pills, bennies, speed)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) Sedatives/barbiturates (downers)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) Tranquilizers (Librium®, Valium®, Xanax®, etc.)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) "Crack" cocaine
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) Cocaine in powder form
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) Heroin
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) Some other narcotic (codeine, Vicodin®, OxyContin®, Percocet®, etc.)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) Crystal meth ("ice")
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) Steroids (anabolic steroids)
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) Cigarettes
How difficult do you think it would be for you to get the following drug if you wanted some? (Mark one circle) Alcohol
